headline: Archer on course to return to action early next year
intro: The fast bowler is expected to regain full fitness by the time IPL kicks off next year

headline: Women's Hundred set to introduce player draft for upcoming season
intro: The first pick opportunity will go to Welsh Fire, who finished bottom of the standings in the 2022 season

headline: Tahlia McGrath keeps Strikers in hunt to reach WBBL finals
intro: The Adelaide Strikers skipper ended her lean run in stunning fashion with an unbeaten 93 to help her side chase down 155 inside 15 overs

headline: Live Cricket Score - New Zealand vs India, 1st T20I, Wellington
intro: Catch the live updates from the first T20I between the hosts New Zealand and India in Wellington

headline: African regional qualifying for 2024 T20 World Cup gets underway in Rwanda
intro: Qualifying for the next edition of T20 WC, resumes on November 17 as the first of two eight-team Africa Sub-regionals tournaments gets underway

headline: Jagadeesan, Sudarshan hundreds power Tamil Nadu to easy win
intro: Riyan Parag also continued his rich vein of form by cracking a 93-ball 128 as Assam crushed Sikkim by 180 runs

headline: Pujara, Umesh could be part of India A squad for Bangladesh
intro: The experienced India batter may even be asked to lead the A side

headline: Hughes ton powers NSW to maiden win of the season
intro: Chris Green bagged four wickets as New South Wales beat Tasmania by 160 runs

headline: Majestic Malan helps England post 287/9
intro: Even though wickets fell at regular intervals, Malan stood tall to bring up his second ODI century
